trans-unit.source: Now that your mobile service is ready, you can update the app to store items in Mobile Services instead of the local collection.
trans-unit.target: Now that your mobile service is ready, you can update the app to store items in Mobile Services instead of the local collection.

trans-unit.source: Verify that you have the following lines in the dependencies tag in the build.gradle (Module app) file, and if not add them.
trans-unit.target: Verify that you have the following lines in the dependencies tag in the build.gradle (Module app) file, and if not add them.

trans-unit.source: This adds references to the Mobile Services Android Client SDK.
trans-unit.target: This adds references to the Mobile Services Android Client SDK.

trans-unit.source: Now rebuild the project by clicking on Sync Project with Gradle Files.
trans-unit.target: Now rebuild the project by clicking on Sync Project with Gradle Files.

trans-unit.source: Open the AndroidManifest.xml file and add the following line, which enables the app to access Mobile Services in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Open the AndroidManifest.xml file and add the following line, which enables the app to access Mobile Services in Azure.

trans-unit.source: In Project Explorer, open the TodoActivity.java file located in the GetStartedWithData => app => src => java folder, and uncomment the following lines of code:
trans-unit.target: In Project Explorer, open the TodoActivity.java file located in the GetStartedWithData => app => src => java folder, and uncomment the following lines of code:

trans-unit.source: Comment out the following lines:
trans-unit.target: Comment out the following lines:

trans-unit.source: We will remove the in-memory list currently used by the app, so we can replace it with a mobile service.
trans-unit.target: We will remove the in-memory list currently used by the app, so we can replace it with a mobile service.

trans-unit.source: In the ToDoActivity class, comment out the following line of code, which defines the existing toDoItemList list.
trans-unit.target: In the ToDoActivity class, comment out the following line of code, which defines the existing toDoItemList list.

trans-unit.source: Save the file, and the project will indicate build errors.
trans-unit.target: Save the file, and the project will indicate build errors.

trans-unit.source: Search for the three remaining locations where the toDoItemList variable is used and comment out the sections indicated.
trans-unit.target: Search for the three remaining locations where the toDoItemList variable is used and comment out the sections indicated.

trans-unit.source: This fully removes the in-memory list.
trans-unit.target: This fully removes the in-memory list.

trans-unit.source: We now add our mobile service.
trans-unit.target: We now add our mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Uncomment the following lines of code:
trans-unit.target: Uncomment the following lines of code:

trans-unit.source: Find the ProgressFilter class at the bottom of the file and uncomment it.
trans-unit.target: Find the ProgressFilter class at the bottom of the file and uncomment it.

trans-unit.source: This class displays a 'loading' indicator while MobileServiceClient is running network operations.
trans-unit.target: This class displays a 'loading' indicator while MobileServiceClient is running network operations.

trans-unit.source: In the Management Portal, click Mobile Services, and then click the mobile service you just created.
trans-unit.target: In the Management Portal, click Mobile Services, and then click the mobile service you just created.

trans-unit.source: Click the Dashboard tab and make a note of the Site URL, then click Manage keys and make a note of the Application key.
trans-unit.target: Click the Dashboard tab and make a note of the Site URL, then click Manage keys and make a note of the Application key.

trans-unit.source: You will need these values when accessing the mobile service from your app code.
trans-unit.target: You will need these values when accessing the mobile service from your app code.

trans-unit.source: In the onCreate method, uncomment the following lines of code that define the MobileServiceClient variable:
trans-unit.target: In the onCreate method, uncomment the following lines of code that define the MobileServiceClient variable:

trans-unit.source: This creates a new instance of MobileServiceClient that is used to access your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: This creates a new instance of MobileServiceClient that is used to access your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: It also creates the MobileServiceTable instance that is used to proxy data storage in the mobile service.
trans-unit.target: It also creates the MobileServiceTable instance that is used to proxy data storage in the mobile service.

trans-unit.source: In the code above, replace MobileServiceUrl and AppKey with the URL and application key from your mobile service, in that order.
trans-unit.target: In the code above, replace MobileServiceUrl and AppKey with the URL and application key from your mobile service, in that order.

trans-unit.source: Uncommment these lines of the checkItem method:
trans-unit.target: Uncommment these lines of the checkItem method:

trans-unit.source: This sends an item update to the mobile service and removes checked items from the adapter.
trans-unit.target: This sends an item update to the mobile service and removes checked items from the adapter.

trans-unit.source: Uncommment these lines of the addItem method:
trans-unit.target: Uncommment these lines of the addItem method:

trans-unit.source: This code creates a new item and inserts it into the table in the remote mobile service.
trans-unit.target: This code creates a new item and inserts it into the table in the remote mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Uncommment these lines of the refreshItemsFromTable method:
trans-unit.target: Uncommment these lines of the refreshItemsFromTable method:

trans-unit.source: This queries the mobile service and returns all items that are not marked as complete.
trans-unit.target: This queries the mobile service and returns all items that are not marked as complete.

trans-unit.source: Items are added to the adapter for binding.
trans-unit.target: Items are added to the adapter for binding.
